Elvis Presley

A man who became a King , the King of Rock and Roll !

Elvis leaning back in a chair smiling at the camera

  • Elvis Aron Presley was born on January 8th, 1935, in Tupelo, Mississippi.
  • In 1946 for his 11th Birthday Elvis recieved his first guitar from his mother.
  • He would make is first record debut in 1953 after graduating high school at a recording studio that would later be known as Sun Studio
  • Elvis would soon break out following the release of his first album. His first No. 1 single "Heartbreak Hotel" and his first No. 1 album "Elvis Presley" debuted in 1956. (Pictured Below)
  • Elvis would also star in movies with Paramount Pictures and be the center of many talk shows.
  • In 1957 Elvis would recieve a draft notice from the army where he would go on to serve a year in Germany and 2 years in Europe.
  • While in Europe Elvis meet Priscilla Beaulieu who he fell in love with quickly. The pair would get married May 1st, 1967 in Las Vegas, Nevada. (Pictured Above)
  • Elvis and Priscilla would have a daughter, Lisa Marie, the year after the wed.
  • Shortly after Lisa Marie's birth, in 1970, Elvis and Priscilla would get divorced and Elvis would fall back heavily on his prescription drug addiction.
  • Despite his personal issues and addiction and his extreme weight loss at the time Elvis was still a wildly popular attraction especially on the Vegas strip.
  • In June 1977 Elvis would perform in his last ever concert in Indianapolis, Indiana.
  • Just a few months after his concert in Indiana Elvis would be at home in his Graceland mansion and die of heart failure.
